name: Pigeon Game
description:
Don't you just love pigeons?  They're round, fluffy, and goofy. Don't you just want to touch their round fluffy bodies? Feel them squish into your hands? 

Well, now you can! In Pigeon Game, you can watch, feed, chase, pet, befriend, and hold pigeons!!!! There's different pigeons in the game to meet and get to know - try see if you can hold them all :-) Download to have a play with some round pals.
